import React from 'react' import Modal from "react-bootstrap/Modal" import ModalBody from "react-bootstrap/ModalBody" import ModalHeader from "react-bootstrap/ModalHeader" import ModalFooter from "react-bootstrap/ModalFooter" import { ModalTitle } from 'react-bootstrap' import fractal_6 from '../images/fractal/a_trip_to_the_moon.png' // props: source, caption function Image(props) { return (

{props.content.caption}

) } export default Image
